readme:
This workflow retrieves all Squarespace Orders and saves them into a Google Sheets spreadsheet using the Squarespace Commerce API. It uses pagination to ensure all orders are collected efficiently.

## How It Works

  * The workflow queries your [Squarespace Orders API](https://developers.squarespace.com/commerce-apis/retrieve-all-orders).
  * It fetches data in paginated batches and inserts them into Google Sheets.
  * The **Global node** is used to configure API parameters dynamically, allowing users to set date filters, pagination, and fulfillment status.
  * The workflow runs on demand or on a schedule, ensuring your data stays up to date.



### Parameters

This workflow allows you to customize the API request using the Global node settings:

  * **api-version** (string, required) – The current API version (see Squarespace Orders API documentation).
  * **modifiedAfter** ={a-datetime} (string, conditional) – Fetch orders modified after a specific date (ISO 8601 format).
  * **modifiedBefore** ={b-datetime} (string, conditional) – Fetch orders modified before a specific date (ISO 8601 format).
  * **cursor** ={c} (string, conditional) – Used for pagination, cannot be combined with other filters.
  * **fulfillmentStatus** ={status} (optional, enum) – Filter by fulfillment status: PENDING, FULFILLED, or CANCELED.
  * **maxPage** – Set -1 to enables infinite pagination to fetch all available orders.



## Requirements

### Credentials

To use this workflow, you need:

  * [Squarespace API Key](https://developers.squarespace.com/commerce-apis/authentication-and-permissions) – Retrieve from your Squarespace settings.
  * Google Sheets API credentials – Required to insert data into a spreadsheet.



### Google Sheets Setup

  * Use the [Squarespace order export](https://beyondspace.studio/blog/how-to-export-orders-data-from-squarespace) feature to create a reference sheet.
  * [Google Sheets template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1hXR3N6xr7zItmGbSlYZmgZ6hf8f3Z8xr-nSWp4AZCqY/edit?usp=sharing) is available



## Who Is This For?

This workflow is designed for:

  * Squarespace store owners exporting orders for tax reports, analytics, or sales tracking.
  * Businesses automating order data retrieval for external reporting.
  * Anyone needing an [efficient way to extract Squarespace](https://beyondspace.studio/blog/how-to-export-orders-data-from-squarespace) order data without manual effort.



Explore More Templates

  * [Get all orders in Shopify to Google Sheets](https://n8n.io/workflows/3218-get-all-orders-in-shopify-to-google-sheets/)
  * [Sync Shopify customers to Google Sheets + Squarespace compatible csv](https://n8n.io/workflows/3280-sync-shopify-customers-to-google-sheets-squarespace-compatible-csv/)



👉 [Check out my other n8n templates](https://n8n.io/creators/bangank36/)
readme_html:
This workflow retrieves all Squarespace Orders and saves them into a Google Sheets spreadsheet using the Squarespace Commerce API. It uses pagination to ensure all orders are collected efficiently.

How It Works

  • The workflow queries your Squarespace Orders API.
  • It fetches data in paginated batches and inserts them into Google Sheets.
  • The Global node is used to configure API parameters dynamically, allowing users to set date filters, pagination, and fulfillment status.
  • The workflow runs on demand or on a schedule, ensuring your data stays up to date.

Parameters

This workflow allows you to customize the API request using the Global node settings:

  • api-version (string, required) – The current API version (see Squarespace Orders API documentation).
  • modifiedAfter={a-datetime} (string, conditional) – Fetch orders modified after a specific date (ISO 8601 format).
  • modifiedBefore={b-datetime} (string, conditional) – Fetch orders modified before a specific date (ISO 8601 format).
  • cursor={c} (string, conditional) – Used for pagination, cannot be combined with other filters.
  • fulfillmentStatus={status} (optional, enum) – Filter by fulfillment status: PENDING, FULFILLED, or CANCELED.
  • maxPage – Set -1 to enables infinite pagination to fetch all available orders.

Requirements

Credentials

To use this workflow, you need:

  • Squarespace API Key – Retrieve from your Squarespace settings.
  • Google Sheets API credentials – Required to insert data into a spreadsheet.

Google Sheets Setup

  • Use the Squarespace order export feature to create a reference sheet.
  • Google Sheets template is available

Who Is This For?

This workflow is designed for:

  • Squarespace store owners exporting orders for tax reports, analytics, or sales tracking.
  • Businesses automating order data retrieval for external reporting.
  • Anyone needing an efficient way to extract Squarespace order data without manual effort.

Explore More Templates

  • Get all orders in Shopify to Google Sheets
  • Sync Shopify customers to Google Sheets + Squarespace compatible csv

readme_zh:
该工作流通过Squarespace商务API获取所有订单数据，并利用分页机制高效地将订单保存至Google Sheets电子表格中。

## 运行原理

  * 通过[Squarespace订单API](https://developers.squarespace.com/commerce-apis/retrieve-all-orders)查询数据
  * 采用分页批量获取模式将数据插入Google Sheets
  * **全局节点**动态配置API参数，支持设置日期筛选器/分页/履约状态
  * 支持手动触发或定时运行，确保数据实时更新

### 参数配置

通过全局节点可自定义以下API请求参数：

  * **api-version** (必填字符串) - 当前API版本号（参考官方文档）
  * **modifiedAfter** ={日期时间} (条件字符串) - 获取指定ISO 8601日期后修改的订单
  * **modifiedBefore** ={日期时间} (条件字符串) - 获取指定ISO 8601日期前修改的订单
  * **cursor** ={游标} (条件字符串) - 分页标识符（不可与其他筛选器共用）
  * **fulfillmentStatus** ={状态} (可选枚举) - 按状态筛选：待处理/已完成/已取消
  * **maxPage** - 设为-1可启用无限分页获取全部订单

## 使用要求

### 凭证准备

需提前获取：
  * [Squarespace API密钥](https://developers.squarespace.com/commerce-apis/authentication-and-permissions)（从后台设置获取）
  * Google Sheets API凭证（用于表格数据写入）

### 表格配置
  * 参考[Squarespace订单导出指南](https://beyondspace.studio/blog/how-to-export-orders-data-from-squarespace)创建基础表格
  * 可使用现成[Google Sheets模板](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1hXR3N6xr7zItmGbSlYZmgZ6hf8f3Z8xr-nSWp4AZCqY/edit?usp=sharing)

## 适用场景

本工作流特别适合：
  * 需要导出订单数据用于税务申报/销售分析的电商业主
  * 需自动化同步订单数据至外部报表系统的企业
  * 所有希望[高效获取Squarespace订单](https://beyondspace.studio/blog/how-to-export-orders-data-from-squarespace)的非技术人员

## 更多模板
  * [Shopify订单同步至Google Sheets](https://n8n.io/workflows/3218-get-all-orders-in-shopify-to-google-sheets/)
  * [Shopify客户数据同步至Google Sheets+Squarespace兼容CSV](https://n8n.io/workflows/3280-sync-shopify-customers-to-google-sheets-squarespace-compatible-csv/)
  
👉 [查看更多n8n模板](https://n8n.io/creators/bangank36/)

Note","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[-20,-20],"parameters":{"width":320,"height":660,"content":"## 获取所有Squarespace订单
通过Squarespace商务API检索所有订单并保存至Google Sheets电子表格

### 配置说明
打开`Globals`节点并更新以下参数 👇

- **api-version** (字符串，必填) – 当前API版本（参阅Squarespace订单API文档）
- **modifiedAfter**={日期时间} (字符串，条件选填) – 获取指定日期（ISO 8601格式）之后修改的订单
- **modifiedBefore**={日期时间} (字符串，条件选填) – 获取指定日期（ISO 8601格式）之前修改的订单
- **cursor**={游标值} (字符串，条件选填) – 分页标识符，不可与其他筛选条件共用
- **fulfillmentStatus**: 可选值 PENDING（待处理）, FULFILLED（已履约） 或 CANCELED（已取消）
- **maxPage** – 设置为-1可启用无限分页以获取全部可用订单"},"typeVersion":1}],"active":false,"pinData":{},"settings":{"executionOrder":"v1"},"versionId":"fd8ca9c3-787d-40da-aa22-594a3e900f0d","connections":{"Globals":{"main":[[{"node":"Query Orders","type":"main","index":0}]]},"Query Orders":{"main":[[{"node":"Split Out Order ","type":"main","index":0}]]},"Schedule Trigger":{"main":[[{"node":"Globals","type":"main","index":0}]]},"Split Out Order ":{"main":[[{"node":"Squarespace Orders Spreadsheet","type":"main","index":0}]]},"On clicking 'execute'":{"main":[[{"node":"Globals","type":"main","index":0}]]},"Squarespace Orders Spreadsheet":{"main":[[]]}}}
